about_the_game:
From the depths, a long-lost civilization appears! The oceangoing Aquarion tribe has returned from the bottom of the ocean to bring peace back to the Square, and they’ve recruited all sorts of underwater creatures to help them accomplish their goal. During their time in isolation they have developed mermaid tails, providing unprecedented access to both the land and the water!

The Aquarion start with the ability to construct land buildings on the water and their naturally flooded terrain provides movement for both land and aquatic units. If you like a tribe that has a unique water-based gameplay, or you simply have a fondness for the sea, then the Aquarion are the perfect tribe for you!

Aquarion Features:

- Sport mermaid tails that allow their land units to be amphibious!
- Recover forgotten cities under the waves by uncovering Ruins!
- Construct any building you want on the water with the power of pontoons!
- Flood the land so that your naval units can swim up to the cities of your enemies!
- Connect your aquatic cities with Atolls!
- Harvest Aquacrops!
- Tame Turmelons for hit-and-run tactics with Amphibians!
- Plow through swaths of enemy troops with the ranged, trident-throwing Tridention!
- Chomp on enemy ships with sneaky Sharks!
- Zap aggressors with the area-denial powers of the Jelly!
- Drown sections of land with your long-ranged Puffers!
- Control the seas with the mighty Crabs!
